author: Claudette Osborn
content: I take supplements for my Multiple Sclerosis like Vit D, B12, turmeric, ginger root & Lion Mane. I am fasting today and going to start the diet tomorrow. Should I quit my supplements and trust the process or keep taking my supplements? ￼

replies.content: Did you know that heavy metal toxicity is linked with your diagnosis and by getting your body clean, the quality of life would improve for you
I may over lap a bit
I think DR. Anthony Chaffee has a video on that

I have MS. You can’t ditch D2/K3
The roots and fermented food can go
